text: Chico Buarque, occasionally referred to as Samambaia, is a 1978 album recorded by the Brazilian singer and composer Chico Buarque. The album includes hits such as "Cálice", "Pedaço de mim" and "Apesar de você", and features participations by several outstanding Brazilian artists, e.g. Milton Nascimento, Elba Ramalho, Marieta Severo and Zizi Possi. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="180" |Title !!
